project.description:
Set up the Shibboleth SP. This includes:
- setting up the protected resource in httpd - configure attribute-mapping - configure IdP metadata provider

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# register the protected resource in conf.d/shib.conf # in this example the protected resource will be at /oauth2/authorize
HTTPD_HOME="/etc/httpd" HTTPD_SSL_CONFIG="${HTTPD_HOME}/conf.d/shib.conf"
if [ -z "`grep '<Location /oauth2/authorize>' ${HTTPD_SSL_CONFIG}`" ]; then
sudo tee -a ${HTTPD_SSL_CONFIG} <<EOF <Location /oauth2/authorize> AuthType shibboleth ShibRequestSetting requireSession 1 ShibUseHeaders On Require valid-user </Location> EOF
fi
